name: CHOP CHOP: Origins
description:
A game where you play as the spirit of a tree, who hears about an upcoming large scale tree cutting and tries to spread the information to other trees.

This game is a spin-off about the root causes of events from a previous game that I made.  You can play the previous game by clicking on this link: https://efirtina.itch.io/chop-chop

Credits:
